attributes.action: Repeal mindless ruling from E E C
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EG Market trader in Bristol had to dump 5000 kiwi fruits at 1mm under EEC rule of size. To sell or give away carries a fine of £5000

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for specific action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
